metadata.title: Series 17, Episode 4 - 'Apropos of Apoppo.' | Full Episode
metadata.creator: Taskmaster

tracks.text: Greg Davies, the Taskmaster, types at a typewriter. Scenes from the show play, depicting the 5 contestants with absurd situations, costumes, and reactions.
An artist's posable manikin holds out a bent penny. Text appears Apropos of Apoppo
A small bottle with green glittery fluid
Golden dentures for the lower jaw with 4 front teeth
Alex smiles, showing the gap in his teeth, and waves
Zebra print
Unlabeled white wine, Unlabeled grid of chocolate, and a lighter
Feet on the floor, she squats until her fingers touch the floor, then stands tall.
She faces away from the crowd, raises her coat to show her butt, leans forward, puts her hands on the floor, and bounces her feet to jiggle her butt.
She stands, bounces backwards, then puts her hands back on the floor.
She stands, tosses her coat back, and returns to her seat
Happy Birthday to Grandma xxx
A picture of a young woman wearing nothing but a suit jacket, with an elderly woman's face taped on top
Beware... Alice is an erotic sex object (ask Arthur) Love Steven
Greg and Alex shake hands
Alex stands in front of a wall. 9 rubber gloves stick out of the wall. At the far left, a blackboard is numbered 1 through 9. A manequin hand holds out the task and a pair of scissors
He yanks on the glove
Sophie and Steve cut Glove 1's finger
Glove 5 gives a thumbs up
She rubs her hands over the glove
She sniffs it
He cuts 3
He tastes it, then sticks out his tongue
He rips
A L blank X, H blank blank N E
Nick has everything right except 4. He wrote X-box instead of Xylophone
The gloves are in the shape of A H
Sophie and Nick high 5
John smiles tensely
He holds up 1 finger, then clasps his hands together
Steve and Joanne 5, Sophie 4
Several horses graze in an open field
Numbered white discs are stacked in a wheeled basket
Nick walks across the field, his Dracula cape billowing in the wind
She looks over the field
Nick walks around. Horses watch from nearby
The horses walk through Sophie's dots
Nick makes a long line
John removes his yellow jacket. A mare walks past Sophie.
Nick runs off, cape fluttering behind him
The line loops once, runs far away, doubles back, and squiggles at the end.
The line spirals out, creating a snail shell. The line continues to outline the body, neck, head, and other side of the neck. Another line completes the snail body.
Dots resembling a bull
Several lines draw the body, snout, legs, spots, face, horns, nostrils, and tail
Clusters of dots
Lines create a picture frame.
Lines draw hands, a dress, and a squiggly skull face. In the bottom right, dots spell out S P. A yellow dot is added to the bottom left.
Steve gives Sophie a thumbs up
A loop arcs to another loop. A second line draws straight down, connecting to another arc. It resembles Joanne's uterus drawing from Episode 1.
She pointed her laugh lines, the crease from her nostrils to the corners of her mouth.
John and Sophie high 5 over Nick, who smiles

A task is cut as if it's been cracked in half. One half of the envelope sits in Study. A desert sits in the Lab, Greg's statue listens to a walkman in the yard, yellow roses sit in the Camper. Candles flicker by Greg's picture.
They approach a grandfather clock
Outside, they approach the camper
They see the walkman
They approach the Lab
They lift the desert, then break it apart. There's paper inside
Down the hall
In the Study
Past a magnifying glass revealing the word "disc"
Through the double doors into the courtyard
Entering an out building
The envelope is in a picture frame with a disc
They grab cake in their hands and eat
In front of the camper
John opens the grandfather clock face
A knight statue holds a shield
The outbuilding
John keeps eating
They walk in the opposite direction of the mailbox
Steve holds one end and drops his roll. Nick has to pause immediately.
Steve pauses
Joanne pauses
Sophie, John, and Nick pause
Sophie unwinds her roll
Sophie pauses. Joanne is wadding hers up, Steve is shoving his through
Steve raises his roll, the paper hanging down
Sophie drops her roll to applaud
Steve arranges his paper
John walks away. Joanne pauses. Nick looks at his broken tube.
Sophie tosses her tube in the air
Joane puts a final wad in her tube
They make their way through the heaps of toilet paper
Steve gasps. Sophie purses her lips.
He sticks the broken tube on the paper like a bandaid
Sophie 14, Nick 13, Steve 12
Credits roll
John, wearing dentures, smiles from behind a mannequin in the zebra print onesey
He sniffs the potion, then puts it back
He gestures to Steve's cards
He uses the mannequin to wave to the crowd while he chews something
